name: Abi Game
description:
Welcome to Abi

A family was apparently separated a few years ago when the parents of their two children died in a car accident. With their parents dead, the two children were placed in the custody of their grandparents due to being the next of kin.

Years later the younger brother dies and the older brother feels obliged to find out the cause of his brother's death.

Mysterious house

The family's house is old and consists of sev- eral divisions in which there will be challeng- es for the player to do and thus discover the

cause of the younger brother's death.

Visuals

The game has a dark and retro look, due to the tone of the various elements present in the rooms of the house, and these are placed in places that make the game more terrifying, giving it more realism.

Desenvolvido para Desenvolvimento de Jogos por:
